summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3925 for the improvement of Wheeler Street from a point approximately 150 feet west of Nob Hill Avenue, to a point approximately 120 feet east of Nob Hill Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47778, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
